Package com.bytedesk.core.email

Class EmailIdleListenerService

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.core.email.EmailIdleListenerService
@Service public class EmailIdleListenerService extends Object
邮件IDLE监听服务 使用IMAP IDLE协议实现实时邮件接收，替代轮询方式
